subject: RE: Response to RFI
body:
That is great news.  I will book the conference room for the 16th.  

 

We can meet virtually or talk on the phone in the first week of January.  I will be out of state from Dec 27-Jan 4th, but I will have my lap top and phone with me during that time.  

 

Our work group meets January 7th.  Do you want to have a conversation prior to the 7th?  

 

 

Jake Burke

Captain � Investigations Division

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401

(541) 682-5895 work

 

 



 

From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Thursday, December 19, 2024 6:20 PM
To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov>
Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: Re: Response to RFI

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Capt, 

 

My team is almost done filling out the document.

 

Count us in for 1/16! Can we meet before then to make sure we come as well prepared as possible? First week of Jan?

 <https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/open/3d79ef42-58c4-4b38-bea5-6c9bc65e77b3.gif> 

 

On Wed, Dec 18, 2024 at 3:07?PM BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

	That is great news.  My team assigned to this project does not meet again until January 7th.  End of week works well and give me time to get the information to IT for review prior to our next team meeting.  

	 

	Additionally, I would like to start conversations about setting up a demo at EPD if possible.  We are working with partner agencies, and I wanted the opportunity to invite them as well as command staff and other EPD staff.  

	 

	These dates are available for our conference room at HQ.  Ideally, January 16th if that timeline works for Flock.  If not, there are dates later in the month. 

	 

	 

 

 

 

 

 

 

January 16, 2025

All Day

Kilcullen Rooms

January 22, 2025

Before 1500

Kilcullen Rooms

January 23, 2025

All Day

Kilcullen Rooms

January 28, 2025

After 1330

Kilcullen Rooms

January 30, 2025

After 1030

Kilcullen Rooms

	 

	 

	 

	Jake Burke

	Captain � Investigations Division

	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Road

	Eugene, Oregon 97401

	(541) 682-5895 work

	 

	 

	From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Wednesday, December 18, 2024 2:30 PM
	To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
	Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Re: Response to RFI

	 

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Hi Captain Burke, 

	 

	It is great to meet you. Flock is excited by the potential opportunity to partner with Eugene PD. My team will review the questions and reply asap. Is there a date you'd like to receive the responses by? My goal by EOW but want to ensure we aren't missing any deadlines. 

	 <https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/open/67dd9cb2-71c9-4288-a1cd-09c4d93d1af7.gif> 

	 

	On Wed, Dec 18, 2024 at 9:50?AM BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

		Good morning, Caroline, 

		 

		I was given your contact information from Detective Derek Dewitt.  Thank you for Flock�s response to our recent RFI that closed on December 11th.  First, I would like to introduce myself virtually and let you know I am the project manager for the RFI on behalf of Eugene PD.  

		 

		We are still in the process of reviewing responses to narrow down a selection.  The city IT department has requested some additional information that would assist us in making the decision moving forward. The attached excel document is the City of Eugene IT Software review that would be required before moving forward in any procurement process.   

		 

		Can you or someone from Flock provide answers to the questions in the software review questionnaire?  

		 

		If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me directly.  My cell is 541-990-5516.  

		 

		Thank you 

		 

		 

		Jake Burke

		Captain � Investigations Division

		Eugene Police Department

		300 Country Club Road

		Eugene, Oregon 97401

		(541) 682-5895 work
